Detailed Description

Utility file containing a test light array.

Constructs a light array fitted for the Aarhus airport.

Function Documentation

◆ generate_test_light_array()

def src.utils.generate_test_light_array ( )

Generates a test light array.

Test light array is fitted to the Aarhus airport simulation. Light colors are evenly distributed.

Returns
The test light array.
